name: DYNASH-C
description:
Your computer has been infected by a deadly malware and the only way to fix it is to go inside the motherboard and destroy it and retrieve the files.

On Windows:

Use the arrow or W,A,S,D keys to control the player and the mouse to aim and shoot!

On Android:

Use the joysticks to control the player and shoot.

You can either play the endless mode where enemies and coins spawn endlessly, or in story mode where you can play different levels!

This is my first ever game and it currently is in alpha stage Things to fix and add are

  • Fixing the exit button
  • Adding more levels
  • Adding more effects and music to the game
  • Adding a storyline to the game
  • and much more

The game is currently made in Godot version 3.5.1.

Music used in the levels is by:

Clement Panchout:https://clement-panchout.itch.io/yet-another-free-music-pack
